text: Wash & Wax is a professional car detailing business operating in Sheffield, United Kingdom, providing high-quality interior and exterior vehicle detailing services along with optional add-ons to enhance vehicle appearance and cleanliness. The business is owned and operated by Lewis Malden, a Sheffield-based entrepreneur focused on delivering reliable and thorough detailing services.
Wash & Wax service hours are Monday through Friday from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM, Saturday from 10:00 AM to 5:00 PM, and the business is closed on Sundays.

Wash & Wax offers several core detailing services, including Interior Detailing priced at $100, which includes deep cleaning of seats, carpets, the dashboard, and interior surfaces; Exterior Detailing priced at $80, which includes a full exterior wash, cleaning, and finishing of the vehicle’s exterior surfaces; and a Full Detail service priced at $150, which combines both interior and exterior detailing for a complete vehicle clean.

Wash & Wax offers optional add-on services that customers can include with their detailing package, such as pet hair removal, waxing and ceramic coating, upholstery cleaning, and odor removal, with add-on pricing varying depending on the vehicle’s condition and specific requirements.
Customers can contact Wash & Wax via email at camillus@camilluscodes.com and the business is owned by Lewis Malden, based in Sheffield, United Kingdom.
